items.name: static let commonModes: CFRunLoopMode!
items.desc: Objects added to a run loop using this value as the mode are monitored by all run loop modes that have been declared as a member of the set of “common” modes with CFRunLoopAddCommonMode(_:_:).

items.name: static let defaultMode: CFRunLoopMode!
items.desc: Run loop mode that should be used when a thread is in its default, or idle, state, waiting for an event. This mode is used when the run loop is started with CFRunLoopRun().
